# delegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate that provides information needed to complete transactions.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any SKPaymentQueueDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This delegate implements the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentQueueDelegate] protocol.

## Managing Transactions

- **transactions**: Returns an array of pending transactions.
- **add(_:)**: Adds a payment request to the queue.
- **finishTransaction(_:)**: Notifies the App Store that the app finished processing the transaction.
